feats.name: Acrobatic

feats.description: +2 on Investigate and Sense Motive checks

feats.description: Reroll miss chance

feats.description: Disarm doesn't provoke attack of opportunity

feats.description: +2 to Str or Dex checks on trips and grapples

feats.description: Opponent receives no Strength bonus to attack, only to damage

feats.description: No penalties when firing from a mount

feats.description: +4 dodge bonus against attacks of opportunity

feats.description: +1 Dodge against ranged attacks
